title: Dreamehome
description:
Through the App , you may not only access to advanced functions of your robot for your daily home floor cleaning, but also set up preferred cleaning zones and time as you like. Now you could do your home floor cleaning at your hand with the help of Dreamehome.

Remote Control: You could control and operate the robot like the machine staying with you, once the robot is connected to App. Whether you are outside home or far away from the robot at home, you would locate the robot in the map, adjust the parameters, check out the cleaning schedule etc.

Device Information: With the App, you could explore the full functions of your robot, learn about the working status, get error or task messages, check the usage data of accessories etc.

House Map: A cleaning map of your house will help your robot learn and understand the space of your home. By mapping, you could set up the cleaning task with the right rooms or areas for each cleaning task by Dreame robot.

Cleaning by special area: When only a special small area needs a quick cleaning right away, the function cleaning by special area is exactly the right thing for you.

No-Go Zone: If there is any area not to go for cleaning, a simple frame mark could give you a safe cleaning area.

Cleaning Schedule: Set up the cleaning day and time, even the zones as you preferred so that your robot works at the right time for the right zone.

Firmware OTA: OTA (Over The Air) technology will help you upgrade your robot software to the latest version. You would not miss any update from our continuous improvement and new function release.

Voice control: After you finishing signing up the App and adding your robot, your device may work with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant by an connecting operation. 

User Manual: You could find the electronic user manual as well as the FAQ for your robot.

Device Sharing: One robot could be controlled among our family members by Device Sharing function via the App.

Contact us:
Email: aftersales@dreame.tech
Website: www.dreametech.com

title: ECOVACS HOME
description:
ECOVACS HOME debuts! With awesome connected features, our latest App allows you to control your DEEBOT anytime, anywhere, and takes your cleaning experience to a new level.

By connecting to your DEEBOT, you can: 
• Start, pause, or stop cleaning
• Set a regular cleaning schedule
• Set voice report, suction power, and Do-Not-Disturb time*
• Receive notifications from your Wi-Fi enabled robot*
• Share DEEBOT with your friends through multiple accounts*
• Receive software and firmware updates*
• Access instruction manuals, video tutorials and FAQs, and contact customer service

And you can do much more with your advanced mapping DEEBOT (powered by Smart Navi™ Technology):
• Set up Virtual Boundary™ to create no-go zones*
• Use Custom Cleaning to customize any cleaning area you want*
• View real-time stats from the visual map of your home, areas cleaned, and cleaning time*
• Adjust water flow level when DEEBOT is mopping (Robots with mopping function only)*
*Features vary with models. Go to ecovacs.com to see detailed features of your model.

*** App permissions***
The application service requires the following permissions on your phone. For optional permissions, if they are not accessed, the related features will not be available, but it will not affect the basic using of the App. 
[Required Permissions]
/

[Optional Permissions]
-Location: Used for device networking, discovering nearby devices, and obtaining WiFi information currently connected to the mobile device.
-Camera: Scan the QR code on the Robot for networking, and scan the sharing code for device sharing.
-Photos and Videos(Storage): Used for changing profile pictures, posting image comments, and online customer service providing feedback via images.
-Microphone: Audio and video call feature for customer service and Robot Video Manager.
-Bluetooth: Used for connecting devices via Bluetooth, enabling network configuration and robot controlling.
-Nearby Devices: Used for scanning and discovering nearby Bluetooth devices during network configuration.
-WLAN: Used for connecting to the Wi-Fi hotspot emitted by the device for network configuration.
-Notifications: Used for sending device and system notification messages to users.
-Local Network: Used to enable local network access on iOS devices, allowing connection to the Wi-Fi hotspot released by the device during network configuration.
-Music and audio: Audio and video call feature for customer service and Robot Video Manager.

Plus, you can control your DEEBOT with simple commands through Amazon Alexa and Google Home**.
**Smart Home commands are available only in some countries/regions.

Requirements:
Wi-Fi with 2.4 GHz or 2.4/5 GHz mixed band support only
Mobile device with Android 4.4 or later

Need help? Visit ecovacs.com for more information or to contact our customer service team.

title: 아이닉 스마트 로봇
description:
Conveniently use the Inic robot vacuum cleaner series products with one app.

You can connect and control robot vacuum cleaners quickly and easily using the Iniq smart robot. 

[Main Features]
1. Select various cleaning modes (designated area cleaning function/scheduled cleaning function/side cleaning function, etc.)
2. Various map management and map editing functions (mapping function/map memory function/3D map function)
3. Remote control (real-time monitoring/obstacle identification/automatic charging/AI function)
4. Maintenance (consumable replacement notification/error message)

[Supported products]
Robot vacuum cleaner iX30 AI Ultra

[Usage environment]
There may be restrictions on use depending on some mobile device environments.
Supports Android OS 4.4 and above
Wifi 2.4GHz supported (5GHz not supported)

[Product and A/S related inquiries]
Please call our customer service center at 1800-8515 and we will kindly respond.

The INIQ Smart Robot App is an application designed by “INIQ Co., Ltd.” (hereinafter referred to as “INIQ” or “Company”) for house cleaning robots. Through the Iniq Smart Robot App, you can easily connect your mobile phone with Iniq's cleaning robot to achieve comprehensive intelligent cleaning control.

With the Iniq Smart Robot app, you can enjoy the following convenient features:

[Remote Control]: You can control and set up the cleaning robot at any time via your mobile phone, no matter where you are. Whether you want to start, pause, or stop the cleaning task or adjust the cleaning mode, everything is under your control.

[View status]: Check the current location, operating status, and consumable usage of the cleaning robot in real time. You can track your robot vacuum cleaner's battery level, cleaning progress, and consumables that need to be replaced.

[Quick Actions]: Preset frequently used cleaning tasks and start with one click, so you don't have to repeat settings every time. For example, you can set Quick Cleaning mode for daily light cleaning and Deep Cleaning mode for weekly cleaning.

[Show Map]: You can view the 2D or 3D map generated by the cleaning robot to clearly understand the cleaning route and cleaning area. The map makes it easy to identify areas that have been cleaned and those that still need attention.

[Scheduled Cleaning]: When you set a cleaning schedule, the cleaning robot will automatically start cleaning at the specified time. Whether it's every morning or when you go out, you can keep your home tidy by having the cleaning robot start on time.

[Do not disturb mode]: Set the do not disturb time to prevent the cleaning robot from disturbing you when you are resting or need quiet time. You can set a sleep time at night so that the robot vacuum cleaner does not perform cleaning tasks during that time.

[Map Edit]: Edit the cleaning map generated by the cleaning robot, optimize the cleaning route, and improve cleaning efficiency. You can mark off-limits areas on a map or prioritize cleaning areas to have the robot vacuum according to your needs.

[Device Sharing]: Share device permissions with family and friends and enjoy smart cleaning together. Each user can control the cleaning robot via their mobile phone, share household chores, and collectively keep the house clean.

title: NEAT-O
description:
NEAT-O: Negative Emotions and Addiction Tools for Opioid Use Disorder

Pilot Version – For Approved Study Participants Only

NEAT-O is a digital support program designed to help individuals with opioid use disorder (OUD) manage difficult emotions and build practical skills for daily life. This app is part of a research study being conducted by the University of Minnesota and is only available to participants who have enrolled in the study.

Why NEAT-O?
Designed for OUD + anxiety/depression – content targets the vicious cycle between mood and opioid use.
Evidence-informed – built on clinically tested Vicious-Cycle CBT and supported by NIDA funding.
Self-paced, mobile-first – use anytime, anywhere, no therapist required.

What you can do inside the app
Skill Modules
Learn and practise core coping skills—breathing, problem-solving, cognitive reframing, mindfulness and more—in short, interactive lessons.

Daily Wellness Tracker
Log mood, stress and craving in seconds; spot triggers with simple charts.

Personal Practice Journal
Reflect on lessons and set action plans that fit your day-to-day life.

Resource Library
Quickly reach crisis lines, MOUD info and community supports.

Favorites
Pin the lessons you rely on most for one-tap access.

Privacy & data
All information you share is encrypted, stored securely and used only for the approved study, exactly as described in your consent form.

Who should download?
Only individuals who have received an invitation link or enrolment code from the NEAT-O study team. If you have not enrolled, the app will not function.

NEAT-O is a self-guided research tool—not a medical device, therapy app or substitute for professional care. Always follow the advice of your healthcare provider.

title: Narwal Freo
description:
The Narwal Freo app allows you to control the Narwal robots remotely, view its working status anytime you want, from anywhere you are. 
Using this app, you can unlock the more advanced functions of Freo!

[Multiple Cleaning Modes]
Freo is equipped with 5 cleaning modes, including Freo Mode, Vacuum and Mop, Vacuum then Mop, so that you can choose the one that suits your floor the best. 

[Customized Cleaning Plans]
Long story short, you can customize in any way you want! You get to decide the cleaning sequence, frequency, even the mopping pressure and moisture of the robot via this app, so that you can get the most flawless floor in just one click! 

[Spot Cleaning]
Only one specific area is dirty? You can select that one place on the app, and Freo will head out to clean!

[Map Management]
Merge and divide rooms as you want! You can even set no-go zones to make sure Freo doesn't intrude!

[Customized Cleaning Reports]
At the end of each cleaning plan, you can see how Freo made your floor spotless through a customized and engaging short video!

title: TESLA RoboStar iQ500/iQ600
description:
Imagine the latest cleaning technology in your home. The TESLA RoboStar iQ600 / iQ500 robotic vacuum cleaner is equipped with artificial intelligence that combines careful space analysis with continuous improvement of the scanning algorithm. The firmware of the robotic vacuum cleaner is continuously improved and its cleaning algorithm is optimized. If a new firmware version is available, the application will offer you the option to download the update from the Internet and install it in a robotic vacuum cleaner.

title: MEDION Service - By Servify
description:
The MEDION service app is your personal device assistant to manage all your MEDION devices (mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, PCs, home appliances and electronics) and to receive supporting information.

Key facts at a glance:
+ Safely register your MEDION devices in your account.
+ Check your MEDION device with the diagnostics function.
+ In case of a hardware defect you can order a repair online.
+ Even if no mistake can be diagnosed, MEDION does not leave you alone with your problem and provides you with help, such as tutorials, user solutions and answers to frequently asked questions.

To perform hardware tests, the app requires shares for some components. These are for the purpose of the test only and are only initiated by the tester or not used for other activities. In addition, you can always control, revise or extend or reduce shares given in the Android settings. For a full test it is also necessary that your device is online.
Below are the backgrounds for the necessary approvals:
• Phone calls: device identification (IMEI, serial number)
• Location: GPS and network test
• Memory: read and write test
• Audio, Microphone: Audio recording and playback
• Camera, Pictures, Videos: Camera function and picture view of the test picture
• Show over other apps (Overlay): Message during the test process
• Change system settings: Brightness test

If the message appears in the Playstore: "The app may not be optimized for your device," this is due to a lack of landscape support. The functionality of the app is of course tuned to your MEDION device and deliberately designed for use in portrait format.

This app is powered by Servify (Service Lee Technologies Pvt. Ltd.). Servify is a technology platform that enables comprehensive device management.

title: 씽크에어 로봇청소기

You can choose only the space you want and clean it intensively. You can only clean the kitchen after cooking, only the bedroom before you go to sleep, and only the living room before you come.

title: 에브리봇 Q9
description:
#Create and edit maps
You can create maps, edit rooms, or set exclusion zones to create optimized cleaning preferences for your robot vacuum cleaner.

#Automatic mop cleaning
You can wipe the floor with a clean mop before cleaning, then dock with the all-in-one station during cleaning to continue cleaning after the mop is finished.

#Automatic emptying of dust
When cleaning is complete, the robot vacuum cleaner docks with the all-in-one station and automatically empties the dust bin.

#Automatic mop drying
After cleaning, the all-in-one station automatically cleans the mop and then dries it according to the set cycle.

#Mop edge cleaning
When you activate the function, the mop will automatically extend for edge cleaning when cleaning walls and edges.

#Automatic hair removal
When cleaning is completed and docked with the all-in-one station, hair wrapped around the robot vacuum cleaner's main brush can be automatically removed.

#Automatic emptying of dust
When cleaning is complete, the robot vacuum cleaner docks with the all-in-one station and automatically empties the dust bin.

#Automatic mop drying
After cleaning, the all-in-one station automatically cleans the mop and then dries it according to the set cycle.

#Mop edge cleaning
When you activate the function, the mop will automatically extend for edge cleaning when cleaning walls and edges.

#Automatic hair removal
When cleaning is completed and docked with the all-in-one station, hair wrapped around the robot vacuum cleaner's main brush can be automatically removed.
summary: With this app exclusively for the Everybot Q9 All-in-One robot vacuum cleaner, you can use various robot automation functions.

title: Evolution Robot (2016)
description:
Evolution Robot is a Clementoni Robotics APP for children of 8 years of age and upwards. It has been specifically created so you can play with your robot and also find out about coding.
With this free Science & Play TechnoLogic APP, you can have amazing adventures with Evolution Robot and discover how it works first-hand. 
The APP has been specially developed so that you can control your robot in 7 different game modes: Programming, Real Time, Gyro, Touch Grid, Dancing, Self-Learning and Memo.
Bluetooth® technology means you can programme your robot, control it in real-time by simply tilting your smartphone or tablet, make it dance and even teach it to understand your commands. 
What’s more, in Memo Mode, you can train your brain and test your observation skills, either on your own, or with your friends, and try to work out what the robot will do next. What makes Evolution Robot even more engaging is the fact you can access its camera and take pictures and record videos of your robot as it carries out your commands. 
What are you waiting for? Download the APP start having fun now!

How long have you dreamt of having your very own robot that can open and close its arms, grip objects, move over difficult terrain, smile and talk? This APP means your wait is now over… your dream has finally come true! With Evolution Robot, technological evolution is in your hands!

title: SambaLite
description:
SambaLite is a lightweight, modern, and open-source Android client for SMB/CIFS shares (Samba). The goal is to provide a minimalist, reliable, and secure tool that allows users to access SMB shares on their local network - without any unnecessary features, ads, or bloat.

The app is designed for tech-savvy users who are looking for a lean, transparent solution and value privacy and open source.

Main features:

• Manage connections: Enter SMB server (hostname or IP) and share/path, username, password, optional domain (workgroup)
• Manage multiple connections with individual names
• Connection testing with clear error messages
• Automatic, secure storage of credentials (Android Keystore)
• File browser: Navigate through the share directory tree, display of name, type, size, and modification date
• Refresh view ("Pull-to-Refresh")
• Sorting options (name, date, size)
• File operations: Download, upload, delete, rename
• Display file properties
• Dark/Light Mode (system default)

Security & Privacy:
• No telemetry or third-party connections
• No unencrypted storage of sensitive data
• Minimal permissions (only network and access to user-selected storage locations)

SambaLite is the open-source Samba client for Android that many have wanted for years: Modern, lean, secure, without unnecessary features, but with everything needed for practical access to SMB shares.

title: Robot Room Cleaner
description:
Robot Room Cleaner is the premier robot vacuum simulator game

Step into the exciting world of robotics with this cutting-edge robot vacuum simulator game! Experience the thrill of operating a state-of-the-art robot vacuum cleaner and navigate it through a variety of challenging environments.

In this simulation, you'll have to tackle obstacles (including pets), clean mess, and collect dirt and debris with precision and efficiency. With intuitive controls and realistic physics, you'll feel like you're actually operating a real robot vacuum.

But it's not just about cleaning. You'll also have to manage your battery life, robot capacity, and keep an eye out for potential obstacles. Adding an extra layer of challenge to the experience.

With realistic floor-cleaning graphics and immersive sound effects, Robot Room Cleaner offers an experience like no other. Whether you're a fan of robotics, or just looking for a fun, relaxing, and engaging game, Robot Room Cleaner is a must-have for anyone who loves a good challenge.

The most satisfying game:

Watch as the floor becomes clean in real-time as you control your robot vacuum to clean the entire room.

Clean everything:

Vacuum up dust, crumbs and more while avoiding furniture, pets and other obstacles.

Plan your cleaning routes carefully. Be sure to return to base stations to recharge before your robot runs out of battery, or fills up to capacity. Maximize efficiency and clean each room as quickly as possible, or vacuum at your own pace, the choice is yours.

Clean rooms successfully to earn credits to unlock more robots, with different stats. Some are faster, some have higher capacities and battery lives. You'll find different robots are better suited for different rooms and different play styles.

Features:

• Actual real time floor cleaning mechanics
• Relaxing, satisfying and calming gameplay
• Multiple levels
• Multiple robot vacuums to unlock
• Pets and other obstacles to avoid
• Complete challenges to unlock new robot vacuums
• Easy to use controls, simply swipe or use a gamepad to control your robot vacuum

title: ROMY robot
description:
Stay connected! The ROMY app keeps you up to date on what your robot is up to. Access a fully functional map after the first exploration run thanks to the fastest map generation on the market. Set a cleaning schedule, smart no-go areas and cleaning reminders to smarten up your cleaning routine with ROMY. 

ACCESS THE FULL FUNCTIONALITY OF YOUR ROBOT WITH THE ROMY APP
• Immediately edit and customize the map after the first exploration run
• Clean your entire home or focus on specific rooms and areas
• Create restricted no-go areas
• Use the spot cleaning function for a quick clean of small areas
• Let ROMY suggest smart no-go areas when it gets stuck in one place several times
• Set a cleaning schedule for automatic cleaning with the calendar function
• Start ROMY while you're on the go
• Stay up to date with push notifications
• Allow smart suggestions, so ROMY can automatically remind you if you haven't cleaned a room for a while 
• Stay fully informed on ROMY's estimated cleaning times
• Find out which areas ROMY has already cleaned with the visible cleaning path updated in real time
• Create maps for up to 3 different areas (floors)
• Define the floor type for rooms or areas – carpet will be automatically left out during a wet cleaning run

A 5 MINUTE JOB INSTEAD OF 2 HOURS OF NOISE
The robot's smart navigation reacts to obstacles in real time and updates the cleaning path and map during every run. Create convenient special cleaning zones for areas that you want to clean regularly. For example, you could send ROMY to do a quick vacuum under the dining table after every meal. 

DO YOU HAVE CHILDREN OR PETS? THEN YOU KNOW ALL ABOUT LITTLE ACCIDENTS. 
Send ROMY exactly where it needs to go using the spot clean function. Chaos in front of the food bowl, but the rest of the room is fine? Let ROMY vacuum with pinpoint accuracy without having to clean the whole room. 
NO-GO AREAS AND SMART NO-GO AREAS
Create areas that you want ROMY to avoid when cleaning. The tangled cables under your desk, for example. If ROMY experiences difficulties in a certain area, it will suggest creating a smart no-go area. 
NO SURPRISES – WE HAVE A PLAN
Always stay in the know about cleaning schedules, progress, and the remaining duration of the cleaning run. Assuming there are three rooms to clean in your apartment, ROMY will tell you in which order it will clean them and how long it will take. 
FLEXIBLE AND RELIABLE
Everyone's out? Then now is the perfect time to let ROMY work for you. Or use the app to set fixed days, times, rooms and areas to clean. ROMY cleans autonomously and independently. Are you expecting a spontaneous visit? No problem: use the app to tell ROMY to clean while you are on the go and return to find the job done. 
SUPER STRONG OR SUPER SILENT
Super silent, silent, normal or intensive: ROMY has four different cleaning intensities that can be assigned to individual rooms or areas. 
CARPETS LIKE IT DRY
Assign a floor type to rooms or areas in the app. ROMY recognizes when its water tank is attached and automatically avoids areas that have been defined as carpet. 
ROMY KEEPS YOU UPDATED
Whether it has finished cleaning or the dust container needs to be emptied – ROMY always reports back to you with push notifications on your phone. For lovers of detail, the app gives you an exact record of the total area cleaned, cleaning time, trips, and distance driven.

title: Pocket Bots: Battle Robots
description:
Enter the World of Pocket Bots: Build, Battle, and Conquer!
Get ready for the ultimate robot showdown in Pocket Bots, where you transform machines into powerful warriors and dominate the battlefield. Immerse yourself in this fast-paced, action-packed game that combines strategy, customization, and adrenaline-pumping combat. Whether you're a fan of epic games, intense PvP combat, or thrilling robot games, Pocket Bots delivers an unforgettable experience.
Transform and Build Your Army of War Robots
In Pocket Bots, your creativity and strategy are your greatest assets. Gather parts, assemble unique battle bots, and watch them come to life! With countless customization options, you can transform ordinary machines into powerful war robots ready to conquer the iron war. Choose from a variety of chassis, weapons, and gadgets to build the perfect bot for your battle style. Will you focus on speed, power, or a balanced approach? The choice is yours!

Upgrade Your Bots and Dominate the Iron War
Winning battles is only the beginning. Use your rewards to upgrade your robots and enhance their performance. Equip stronger weapons, reinforce your armor, and optimize your bot’s abilities to stay ahead of the competition. Each upgrade brings you one step closer to ruling the mech arena and becoming a legend in the battle bots league.
Engage in Thrilling Combats
Take your skills to the next level with intense combat. Every match in the mech arena is a test of your wit and reflexes. Climb the ranks, earn trophies, and prove that your battle bots are the best in the world.

Conquer the Mech Arena and Become a Champion
The mech arena is your proving ground, where the strongest robots clash in a battle for supremacy. Compete in tournaments, rise through the ranks, and claim your place as the ultimate war robots commander. Victory isn’t just about brute strength—it’s about smart tactics, quick thinking, and knowing when to strike.

Experience Epic Games in the World of Pocket Bots
With stunning graphics, immersive sound effects, and smooth controls, Pocket Bots offers a gaming experience like no other. Whether you're battling in the iron war or fine-tuning your robot in the workshop, every moment is packed with excitement. Dive into the world of epic games and discover why Pocket Bots is one of the most thrilling robot games available today.

Key Features:
Build and customize unique battle bots with hundreds of parts.
Engage in intense PvP combat and climb the global leaderboard.
Transform your robots with powerful upgrades and enhancements.
Compete in the iron war to prove your supremacy.
Experience high-quality graphics and action-packed gameplay.

Why Play Pocket Bots?
If you love the thrill of competition, the excitement of crafting your own robots, and the challenge of dominating a mech arena, then Pocket Bots is the game for you. It’s not just a game; it’s a battle for glory, strategy, and fun. Step into the world of robot games, where every fight is a chance to rise, every decision shapes your destiny, and every upgrade brings you closer to victory.

Are you ready to become the ultimate war robots commander? Download Pocket Bots today and start your journey in this epic world of battle bots. It’s time to transform, upgrade, and conquer!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit the settings page within this app. For more information visit our Privacy Policy:  https://crazylabs.com/privacy-policy/

title: Robot Mayhem
description:
Robots got consciousness and they will ruin every humanity on earth! Only you can save humanity against dangerous robots.

As a soldier you can get exclusive weapons and stand against most fearsome robots. Robots get more clever and stronger by each wave. Don’t worry, you have unlimited potential of growth! Beware sometimes they may outnumber you and drive you into a corner, you can find a way to survive!

Features:

- Simple one handed control
- Multiply weapons to choose, if you don't like the weapon you can always salvage and choose different ones
- Different types of robots that can outnumber you. Each map have different types of robots.
- Multiply maps to fight against Robots to save humanity.
- Roguelike talent tree to choose your special skills to assist your growth.

UPDATE Features;
- New Hero
- New Maps
- New Talent trees
- New Stages to conquer.
- New Feature; Equipment with additional options
- Additional Shop contents.

Online consultation to solve usage problems in a timely manner: considerate customer service to accompany the usage process at any time

Through the APP, you can complete the composition and various Settings of the machine, as well as remote control, and view the running status, position, working data and other information of the machine. 
"Message" 
When the robot triggers an abnormal alarm, it will push a message to the APP in real time through the cloud. Support users to view the messages of all robots under their name in real time, know the robot anomalies, and facilitate timely processing. 
"Remote Control" 
View the running status of the machine anytime and anywhere, remotely control the work of the robot, and view the current position and work information of the robot in real time. 
"Task Record" 
Can view machine history each task report.

title: SmartLife - Smart Living
description:
SmartLife is an app designed for the control and management of smart devices. This easy-to-use app helps you get smart devices interconnected and brings you comfort and peace of mind. The following advantages take your smart life to the next level:
- Easily connect to and control a full range of smart devices and make them function as you wish, anytime you want.
- Relax and unwind while the user-friendly app takes care of home automation triggered by all factors such as locations, schedules, weather conditions, and device status.
- Intuitively access smart speakers and interact with smart devices under voice control.
- Get informed timely without missing a single important event.
- Invite family members to your home and make it comfy for everyone.

The SmartLife app enhances your home experience in the palm of your hand.

*Application Permissions
This application requires the following permissions. You can use the application without optional permissions, but some functions may be restricted.
[Optional Access Permissions]
- Location: Find locations, add devices, get a Wi-Fi network list, and perform scene automation.
- Notification: Receive device alerts, system notifications, and other messages.
- Access storage permissions: Customize pictures, help & feedback, and more.
- Camera: Scan QR codes, customize pictures, and more.
- Microphone: Pick up the user's video talks and voice commands when devices such as smart cameras and video doorbells are bound.
- Access to nearby devices permissions: It is used to find nearby Bluetooth devices, perform functions such as network configuration and connection

Smart Homes Should be Easy

title: 智能家居管家
description:
The Smart Home Manager APP supports home gateways, smart panels, curtain motors, dimming lights, RGB light strips, various sensors, smart sockets, infrared repeaters, background music hosts and various smart items and other whole-house smart devices. It supports functions such as linkage control between devices, remote control, timing switch, and product usage records. It can be divided into families, add different devices in different rooms, invite family members and assign corresponding permissions. Users can also create scene modes according to their needs and habits, and combine multiple devices to create different usage needs, bringing a more convenient and intelligent experience.

The platform account supports synchronization of mainstream IoT platforms to realize interconnection with other platform devices: Huawei Smart Life, vivo Jovi, Baidu Xiaodu, Xiaomi Mijia, Tmall Genie, Jingdong Xiaojingyu, WeChat Xiaowei, WeChat Mini Program, Telecom Winglet, iFLYTEK, Spichi, Google Assistant, Amazon Echo.

Platform products support a variety of control sources: App, webpage, applet, smart speakers, smart screens, TVs, watches, in-vehicle equipment, and smart robots.

The App is equipped with tourist mode, looking forward to your experience.

title: SS Robot
description:
Silverstar Robot APP is a robot sweeping control application, which can control your sweeping robot for cleaning anytime, anywhere, and check the status and completion of cleaning at any time.
Through the Silver Star Robot APP, you can easily unlock the following advanced functions:
[Cleaning in selected area] You can choose the designated room for cleaning. After selection, only the selected room will be cleaned and the cleaning will be performed in the order of selection.
[Zone cleaning] Select the area you want to clean on the map, and set the cleaning times to achieve key cleaning.
[Forbidden zone setting] Set the forbidden zone, after setting, the robot will not enter the forbidden zone when cleaning.
[Scheduled cleaning] Schedule cleaning tasks, the robot will start cleaning tasks at the specified time.
[Partition editing] After the robot partitions automatically, edit the partitions manually, which can be merged, divided, and named.

title: Boolean Cloud
description:
Boolean Cloud APP — Smart Cleaning at Your Fingertips

Boolean Cloud APP is the dedicated application for controlling the Boolean Cloud smart robot vacuum. By connecting your device with the app, you can remotely start cleaning, view cleaning routes, check real-time status, manage schedules, and track cleaning progress—anytime, anywhere.

One-Tap Start: Save your frequently used cleaning tasks and launch them instantly with a single tap for quick execution.

Multiple Cleaning Modes: Whether it’s daily sweeping, deep mopping, or targeted area cleaning, the app offers various professional modes to fit your needs. Even when you’re away, you can easily set cleaning tasks remotely to keep your home spotless.

Real-Time Cleaning Map: View dynamic cleaning routes and progress as your robot works. Know exactly which areas have been covered and monitor the cleaning status at a glance.

Home Environment Customization: With powerful map editing features, you can split or merge rooms, set no-go zones (e.g., pet areas or play zones), define carpet areas, and adjust layout details. The app mirrors your real home layout for smarter, personalized cleaning.

Cleaning Reports: After each session, receive a detailed cleaning report including cleaned area, duration, obstacles encountered, and re-mopping details. The system intelligently detects heavily soiled areas for extra cleaning and avoids obstacles to protect your furniture.

With continuous OTA updates, your robot will keep evolving with the latest features and improvements.
Experience now and let BooleanCloud APP bring you a cleaner, more comfortable home

title: Palace Rule (蓝颜清梦全球版)
description:
此版本支持简体中文以及英文。
[Game Features]
1. Dramatic Plot, Amazing Dubbing
Super enjoy the story of the Qing palace travels through the novel, the emotional interpretation of the world's cause, if life is just like first sight, ups and downs, watching and playing, the ultimate sultry dubbing, immersive experience, put on headphones and enjoy this moment.
2. Gorgeous Costumes, Be Your Own Designer
Thousands of costumes, hairstyles, makeup, clothing, accessories, socks, shoes, match them as you like. Be the most beautiful girl in the Forbidden City and lead the fashion trend of the Qing Dynasty.
3. Romance in Palace, Lover Development
Despite the indifferent moonlight, characters in palace are sentimental. Dress up to meet lovers, and exchange gifts with each other, as well as your love. Nevertheless, your fate is not in your own hand. Among the four gentlemen in this deep palace, who is your true love?
4. Get Promoted, Seize the Throne of Empress
Step by step, finish dailies to get promoted gradually. How to become the Empress by starting with just a candidate? This is a battlefield for women, do you dare to fight?
5. Train Followers, Form up Your Own Force
Followers from all walks of life can be cultivated and dispatched. Upgrade them to exert their talent in socializing or art, everything is up to you!
6. Companion Pets, Cute and Adorable
Innovative cat house mechanic, come to raise various cute cats, cultivate them to adulthood. Find love for your cats through the whole server, a paradise that cat lovers cannot miss!
7. Manor System, Grow Vegetable and Feed Yourself
Even if you are in the palace, you can experience the manor gameplay! Plant vegetables and harvest them, it would be fun to enjoy a relaxed life like this!

title: iRobot Home (Classic)
description:
The classic iRobot Home App is compatible with older Roomba®, Braava® and Klaara™ products, including Roomba® or Roomba Combo® e, i, s, m, j, Essential, Essential 2, and 10 Max series robots. For other Roomba® models, please download the Roomba® Home app.

Take control of cleaning your home with the classic iRobot Home app. The easy-to-use app offers enhanced maps, room, zone and object-specific cleaning, customized scheduling, personalized cleaning suggestions, and simple smart home integrations with Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant-enabled devices*, all designed to make sure you get the most out of your iRobot floor cleaning robots. This mobile app provides an IoT solution to access and control (remotely & physically) home appliances like Light, Fan, AC, Geyser, TV, Fridge, Set-top box, etc. by allowing users to:
1. Switch appliances on and off at a scheduled time
2. Monitor power usage of each appliance, room or entire house for efficient energy management
3. Create each room
4. Create different scenes
5. Replace different variants of remotes used for AC, TV or Set-top box of any brand
summary: An easy and efficient way to control appliances and monitor power from anywhere.

title: 에브리봇 홈
description:
Enjoy a smarter, more convenient life with the "Everybot Home" app.

Supported Models: Robot Vacuums Q11, Q7, Q3 PLUS, Q3
* Can be used with the same Q3 app user account.

# Map Creation
When you start cleaning, the robot explores your home and creates a map.
Depending on your model, you can create a map by pressing the "Create Map" or "Clean My Home" button.
Once the map is completed, spaces are automatically divided for efficient cleaning.

# Map Editing
You can separate and merge spaces using the [Edit Map] menu on the robot-generated map, and name each space.

# No-Go Zones
Are there any areas where the robot should not enter?
Set no-go zones for areas with low steps of 10cm or less, such as dog poop pads, entrances, and bathrooms.
You can also set no-mopping zones when the mop is attached to prevent it from entering your carpet and damaging it.

# Scheduled Cleaning
Schedule multiple cleaning schedules by freely selecting your preferred time and day (weekdays/weekends).
Even while you're away, cleaning is automatically completed according to a set schedule, ensuring your home is always clean.

# Mop Washing and Drying (Supports Q11 and Q7)
High-temperature washing and hot air drying automatically clean the mop and hygienically dry it.

Keep your robot vacuum cleaner clean even after cleaning.

# AI Smart Cleaning (Supports Q11)
The AI ​​recognition function automatically detects furniture and obstacles,
and cleans using the optimal cleaning path.

It recognizes floor materials and environmental conditions to provide more detailed and efficient cleaning.

# Security Management
Use with confidence, without worrying about your privacy being compromised.
All data collected through the app is encrypted and securely protected.

title: Robot Room Cleaner
description:
Robot Room Cleaner is the premier robot vacuum simulator game

Step into the exciting world of robotics with this cutting-edge robot vacuum simulator game! Experience the thrill of operating a state-of-the-art robot vacuum cleaner and navigate it through a variety of challenging environments.

In this simulation, you'll have to tackle obstacles (including pets), clean mess, and collect dirt and debris with precision and efficiency. With intuitive controls and realistic physics, you'll feel like you're actually operating a real robot vacuum.

But it's not just about cleaning. You'll also have to manage your battery life, robot capacity, and keep an eye out for potential obstacles. Adding an extra layer of challenge to the experience.

With realistic floor-cleaning graphics and immersive sound effects, Robot Room Cleaner offers an experience like no other. Whether you're a fan of robotics, or just looking for a fun, relaxing, and engaging game, Robot Room Cleaner is a must-have for anyone who loves a good challenge.

The most satisfying game:

Watch as the floor becomes clean in real-time as you control your robot vacuum to clean the entire room.

Clean everything:

Vacuum up dust, crumbs and more while avoiding furniture, pets and other obstacles.

Plan your cleaning routes carefully. Be sure to return to base stations to recharge before your robot runs out of battery, or fills up to capacity. Maximize efficiency and clean each room as quickly as possible, or vacuum at your own pace, the choice is yours.

Clean rooms successfully to earn credits to unlock more robots, with different stats. Some are faster, some have higher capacities and battery lives. You'll find different robots are better suited for different rooms and different play styles.

Features:

• Actual real time floor cleaning mechanics
• Relaxing, satisfying and calming gameplay
• Multiple levels
• Multiple robot vacuums to unlock
• Pets and other obstacles to avoid
• Complete challenges to unlock new robot vacuums
• Easy to use controls, simply swipe or use a gamepad to control your robot vacuum

title: Romi
description:
Romi lets you play Rummy Tile (RummyCube, Rummikub, Rami) games against the computer at three different levels. Romi is played with two sets of 52 cards and with two wild cards. The purpose of this game is to form groups of three or more cards, which contain either consecutive cards of the same suit or cards of the same number value but of differing suits.

**What's New in 2.00:**
- Local multiplayer: play with 2-4 players on nearby Android devices
- Automatic reconnection if connection is lost during a game
- PIN protection for multiplayer lobbies
- Pause functionality during multiplayer games
- Option for the winner to start the next game

**Pass and Play mode:**
Play with friends on a single device! In Settings, uncheck the boxes next to player names to make them human-controlled. Pass the device after each turn.

title: ALDI USA
description:
Want a quick, easy, and affordable grocery shopping experience? Order ALDI from anywhere with the new and improved ALDI app. Find your local store, select pickup or delivery, fill your cart and just like that, groceries are just a click away. Download the app, sign in or create your account and get started today.

Features of the ALDI App:
•	Store Locator – Find your local ALDI, get directions, opening hours, services, and contact information.
•	 Weekly Ads – Check out this week’s weekly ad, including ALDI Savers and ALDI Finds, while also previewing next week’s Weekly Ads.
•	ALDI Finds – Discover limited-time only products at incredible prices.
•	Shopping List Tool – If you’d like to shop in store, save products to your virtual shopping list and use it as you navigate your local ALDI.
•	Always Low Prices – Shop with confidence that you’ll be buying high-quality groceries at an affordable, always low price.
•	Order Grocery Pickup and Grocery Delivery – Choose how you shop with either curbside pickup at your local ALDI or delivery to your home.
•	View Past Orders – Re-order a past grocery haul with a single tap or look at past orders and find the products you’ve already purchased.

Start by downloading the ALDI App and connect it with your ALDI account. You can create one in the app or online. Save money on groceries from home or on the go with the ALDI App today!

About ALDI
At ALDI, we hand-select and curate high-quality products for you and your family. We can’t promise you’ll find ten choices of the same item, but we can promise you’ll find the best ones at the best price. At our core, we’re a grocery store offering low prices on high quality food, home goods, and other household items. We’re also a fun place to discover new items and explore healthy options.

ALDI Groceries
We offer groceries to fit everyone’s specific dietary interests, needs or concerns. From organic certified gluten-free products and our meat products that contain no antibiotics, added hormones or animal byproducts, we can fit everyone’s lifestyle.

title: Home-I MV
description:
“Home-I MV” is an app designed for the resident of "Mansion C, Mont Verra". It is for the residents to remotely manage their “Home-I” robot , assigning tasks to “Home-I”.

[Features]
- Call Function
Residents can call “Home-I” to a designated location.

- Delivery Function
Residents can place orders to “Home-I” to deliver items to a designated location.

- Home monitoring
Residents can view the images captured by “Home-I” with timestamps from spotting a person not registered during patrol and break in zone informed by security system.

- Setting and user management
Residents can change the settings of functions and manage the users’ information and authority.

- Shared schedule
Residents can view and edit the schedule which is shared with “Home-I”.

title: ROBOTIS MINI (ROBOTIS)
description:
ROBOTIS MINI is a humanoid robot kit built with the small DYNAMIXEL XL-320 actuator.
(Name is changed from DARWIN-MINI to ROBOTIS MINI)

Users can use the ROBOTIS MINI exclusive App to send various commands to the ROBOTIS MINI,
using the smart device’s button, gesture, voice recognition, and messenger function.

Main functions of the ROBOTIS MINI App.
1. Send commands to the ROBOTIS MINI using buttons (basic movements, soccer moves, fighting moves, etc.)
2. Send commands to the ROBOTIS MINI using gestures (using the gyro sensor of the smart device)
3. Send commands to the ROBOTIS MINI using voice recognition
4. Add or train buttons, gestures, and voices to send commands to the ROBOTIS MINI.

System Requirements
- CPU : 1.2GHz Dual Core
- RAM : 1GB
ex. Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy S2, etc.

title: Robint
description:
The Robint Mobile App connects users with Robint’s robotic products, offering remote control and real-time monitoring. Users can manage their robots from anywhere, and access a wealth of operational data, including running status updates and performance details.



[Remote Control]

The app’s remote control features allow users to monitor and manage their robots' operations from anywhere, at any time, including starting or ending tasks remotely. Users can track the robots' location, view real-time task data.



[Notifications]

Real-time notifications, powered by cloud services, alert users when a robot encounters a health issue or completes a task. This ensures users are immediately informed of any important updates regarding their robots.



[Task Data]

The app also provides access to historical data, including working hours, order data, and detailed task reports, offering valuable insights into robot performance.

title: Kärcher Outdoor Robots
description:
WOW, what an amazing app!

With the Kärcher Outdoor Robots app you have full control over your Kärcher robotic lawnmower. Do you want to adapt the mowing process to your garden down to the last detail? No problem thanks to the Kärcher Outdoor Robots app.

Easily create and manage mowing zones in your garden using the app. You can connect these with corridors or create no-go zones within the mowing area to exclude sensitive areas.

Create individual schedules for the robotic lawnmower to work so that it can do its work undisturbed and you have your lawn to yourself whenever you want.

You can also control the efficiency of your robotic lawnmower. Settings such as cutting angle, mowing speed or rain delay can be set at the touch of a button.

With the Kärcher Outdoor Robots app you have all the options for perfect lawn care in the palm of your hand.

title: ISWARD-Robotic Lawn Mower
description:
This application is the accompanying app for the ISWARD robotic lawn mower.
With the app, you can control the ISWARD robotic lawn mower to set mowing areas, mowing schedules, mowing heights, and view mowing history records. The ISWARD robotic lawn mower will follow a planned route to perform a "bow" shaped mowing, efficiently mowing in a planned patrol route, compared to the random mowing of wire-guided robots. Additionally, it can sense and automatically avoid obstacles.
If you encounter any problems during use, please send an email to service@isward-tech.com to contact us.
descriptionHTML:

With the app, you can control the ISWARD robotic lawn mower to set mowing areas, mowing schedules, mowing heights, and view mowing history records. The ISWARD robotic lawn mower will follow a planned route to perform a "bow" shaped mowing, efficiently mowing in a planned patrol route, compared to the random mowing of wire-guided robots. Additionally, it can sense and automatically avoid obstacles.
If you encounter any problems during use, please send an email to service@isward-tech.com to contact us.
summary: AI Technology for Lawn Care

title: Sensori Robot Controller
description:
The Sensori Robotics Solution is the most advanced robotics mowing solution for landscapers. Robots work as a team using GPS and advanced AI to mow any lawn any where. There are no ground wires, charging stations or base stations required and you don’t need to have one robot per customer which is expensive. Sensori Robotics allow landscapers to optimize crew time and gain more revenue and customers. 
With the Sensori Robotics App you can:
1. Easily activate robots into your own company fleet of robot mowers
2. Create new sites and jobs for your customers by mapping area boundaries and other features. 
3. Start, pause and end mowing jobs for single robots and deploy a team of robots for larger areas
4. Monitor the status of mowing jobs 
5. Set settings for mowing jobs including striping angle, cut height, mowing striping overlap and more
6. On board camera uses AI vision to detect people, animals and obstacles

Through the binding of APP and smart lawn mower, you can obtain the following functions:
• Remote control smart lawn mower via Bluetooth to create work areas, obstacles, blank areas, pathways and more

• Edit already created maps, create restricted areas, virtual walls, etc.
• View the working status and battery level of the smart lawn mower in real time
• Schedule planning for smart lawn mowers and reserve time for work

title: RM connect
description:
Welcome to Martine ROGER, your chartered accountant 2.0!

Because the world is changing, we offer you a handy application for managing your file online 24/7.

This ease of use will allow you at any time to access your documents, to consult the firm's news, or to have visibility on the various activities related to your file.

To facilitate the management of your personnel and within the framework of the obligations related to the nominative social declaration (DSN), we also offer you an interface allowing you to alert us to any event impacting your workforce (new employee, work stoppage, accident, end of contract,...).

We also provide you with a practical tool for calculating your travel expense reports. This will allow you, in addition to calculating your mileage allowances, to manage your hotel, restaurant and plane bills with great ease.

Push notifications will also be very useful to inform you directly of the latest updates on your file.

title: G-Force Robot
description:
The official G-Force Robot APP allows you to control your G-Force robotic lawnmower. This function requires that the hardware accessory is installed in your G-Force Robot. With everything installed you will be able to control, set and track your G-Force robotic lawnmower.

More APP functions available:
- Get the distributor information
- Watch the instruction video
- Get FAQ information
- Display the current location of your G-Force robotic lawnmower on a map
- Receive the status of your G-Force robotic lawnmower
- Click Start, Stop, Home button to control your G-Force robotic lawnmower
- Check and set the configuration of working time and date of your G-Force robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of system language of your G-Force robotic lawnmower
- Check and set configuration of GEO protection of your G-Force robotic lawnmower. Once the distance between your home and your G-Force robotic lawnmower is bigger than GEO there will be a warning on APP
- SMS commands are also available even if your G-Force robotic lawnmower can’t connect the service

title: Automower Connect
description:
The official Husqvarna Automower® Connect app allows you to take full control of your Husqvarna robotic lawnmower. The app provides two modes of connectivity depending on model; Automower® Connect for long-range connectivity using cellular communication, and Automower® Connect@Home for short-range connectivity using Bluetooth. Husqvarna Automower® Connect app provides the following main capabilities:

Status and control
•	Receive the current status of the mower.
•	Receive push notifications if the mower is stopped or is brought outside the installation.
•	Send Start, Pause and Park commands to the mower.

Configure and install
•	Have the mower’s complete menu system on your mobile device.
•	View and change the mower settings, e.g. timers and cutting height.
•	Take advantage of the high resolution and color display on your mobile device to enhance the interaction with the mower.

Security (applicable for Husqvarna Automower® Connect long-range connectivity)
•	Track your mower’s GPS position in real time.
•	Receive push notification alarm in the event of theft.

title: G2 MOW
description: The main function of this software is to realize bluetooth wireless remote control for the intelligent lawn mowing robot of Ningbo Ruilin Machinery Technology Co., Ltd., which can realize functions such as scheduling working time, switching ultrasonic sensors, and switching rain sensors. The software is designed to provide users with more convenient control methods. It is completely offline during use and does not require users to connect to the Internet. title: Autel Link
description:
Autel Link is a management app for the OTOFIX WATCH, which is primarily used to activate vehicle key function of the watch. The OTOFIX WATCH is a programmable smart watch that integrates the functions of an automotive smart key and a smart watch. With Autel Link, you can duplicate the functions of your existing automotive smart key to control your vehicle on the OTOFIX WATCH or via the app.

1. Easy programming: adding your 3rd vehicle key easily
Autel Link with VCI provides easy programming for your OTOFIX WATCH, supporting 80% of mainstream smart key-equipped models.
2. Workout records: recording your workout data
In combination with the OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link accurately records your workout data such as trajectory, distance and pace.
3. Health management: monitor your heart rate, sleep, etc.
Through OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link acquires and presents your real-time health data, such as heart rate, sleep, etc., from the wearable smart watch device (OTOFIX WATCH).
4. Connection with OTOFIX WATCH: acting as your watch manager
After pairing with the OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link allows management of the apps on the watch such as Face Gallery, Alarm, Contacts, Connect/dial/hang up calls, push messages,Weather and Vehicle Key.
5. VIN purchase: increasing the number of VINs
Autel Link provides VIN purchase, allowing you to increase the number of VINs supported by your OTOFIX WATCH.

Important Disclaimer:
This application is not intended for medical use, it is only for recording and managing your healthy life statistics, it is not a medical device.

After pairing with the OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link allows management of the apps on the watch such as Face Gallery, Alarm, Contacts, Connect/dial/hang up calls, push messages,Weather and Vehicle Key.
5. VIN purchase: increasing the number of VINs
Autel Link provides VIN purchase, allowing you to increase the number of VINs supported by your OTOFIX WATCH.

Important Disclaimer:
This application is not intended for medical use, it is only for recording and managing your healthy life statistics, it is not a medical device.
descriptionHTML:
Autel Link is a management app for the OTOFIX WATCH, which is primarily used to activate vehicle key function of the watch. The OTOFIX WATCH is a programmable smart watch that integrates the functions of an automotive smart key and a smart watch. With Autel Link, you can duplicate the functions of your existing automotive smart key to control your vehicle on the OTOFIX WATCH or via the app.

1. Easy programming: adding your 3rd vehicle key easily
Autel Link with VCI provides easy programming for your OTOFIX WATCH, supporting 80% of mainstream smart key-equipped models.
2. Workout records: recording your workout data
In combination with the OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link accurately records your workout data such as trajectory, distance and pace.
3. Health management: monitor your heart rate, sleep, etc.
Through OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link acquires and presents your real-time health data, such as heart rate, sleep, etc., from the wearable smart watch device (OTOFIX WATCH).
4. Connection with OTOFIX WATCH: acting as your watch manager
After pairing with the OTOFIX WATCH, Autel Link allows management of the apps on the watch such as Face Gallery, Alarm, Contacts, Connect/dial/hang up calls, push messages,Weather and Vehicle Key.
5. VIN purchase: increasing the number of VINs
Autel Link provides VIN purchase, allowing you to increase the number of VINs supported by your OTOFIX WATCH.

Important Disclaimer:
This application is not intended for medical use, it is only for recording and managing your healthy life statistics, it is not a medical device.

title: DroneControl - Live stream DJI
description:
Live stream with ultra low latency to anyone in the World and even let them take control of your drone flight/gimbal controls 🎮.

Live streaming

Ultra low latency P2P live streaming to viewers. Your viewers don’t need another app to view live stream, just send them a unique web link (example https://app.dronecontrol.co/) via your favourite messaging app so that they can tune in to your flight via Web browser.

Remote viewer gimbal control

Let your viewers take control of the DJI drone gimbal camera. Viewers can pan and zoom gimbal camera via a simple Web app.

Remote viewer flight control

Let your viewers take control of the DJI drone flight controls. They can control it via a simple Web app, with full telemetry and video available to them in real time.

Unique key features

Ultra low latency⏱

Advanced technology enables us to live stream video with sub 1s latency. Therefore viewers across the World can see your stream in real time and therefore can also fly it without issues related to latency.

Multiple viewers👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Multiple viewers can watch live stream, though video quality depends on the mobile network speed of the streamer.

P2P streaming - full privacy🕵️‍♂️

Live video feed does not pass through the server, therefore complete privacy is guaranteed.

Viewer Flight control options🎮

Your viewers can control your drone using either virtual joysticks controlled by touch control/mouse or by gamepad controller (PS/Xbox).

Enable/disable features☑️

Remote gimbal and flight control can be enabled/disabled for each viewer via a special status page in the app.

Take back control of the drone🕹️

You can instantly disable viewer remote control by slightly moving either left/right joysticks on your controller.

Supported hardware:

• Mavic Pro • Mavic 2 Pro • Mavic 2 Zoom • Mavic 2 Enterprise • Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced • Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual • Mavic Mini 1 • Mavic Mini SE • Mavic Mini 2 • Mavic Air 1 • Mavic Air 2 • Mavic Air 2S • Phantom 4 Pro V2 • Phantom 4 Professional • Phantom 4 Advanced • Phantom 4 • Phantom 4 RTK • Phantom 3 4K • Phantom 3 SE • Phantom 3 Professional • Phantom 3 Advanced • Phantom 3 Standard • Matrice 100 • Matrice 200 • Matrice 210 • Matrice 210 RTK • Matrice 210 V2 • Matrice 300 RTK • Matrice 600 • Matrice 600 Pro • Inspire 1 • Inspire 1 Pro • Inspire 2 To find out more about DroneControl please visit https://consumer.dronecontrol.co/ To find out more about End-user license agreement please visit https://consumer.dronecontrol.co/eula

title: Dazz Drones - Book Drone Shoot
description:
Founded in Spain, with global command centers and operations in 43 countries, Dazz Drones connects businesses and creators to the skies through a network of 1,000+ certified drone pilots worldwide. Every single day, we successfully complete 250+ drone shoots globally, delivering aerial photography and drone videography for real estate, travel, maritime inspections, events, film production, wedding drone shoots, construction site monitoring, vlogs, and enterprise drone services.

With over 10 years of experience in professional drone photography, pilot coordination, and customer service, our app-based platform lets you book drone pilots in minutes—no calls, no confusion, no delays. Whether you need real estate aerial photography, event drone filming, wedding drone videography, or drone inspection services, Dazz Drones makes it simple, fast, and reliable.

We operate exclusively with the latest DJI drones, giving clients full control to choose:

Preferred drone models for cinematic and commercial shoots

Flexible booking slots: 3, 6, or 12 hours, and multi-day drone shoots

Exact location and time scheduling for aerial photography and videography

Behind every flight is our Global Command Center, ensuring smooth execution with expert support for:

Location clearances for legal drone operations

Weather tracking for safe and compliant flights

Visual and regulatory compliance

On-time delivery of high-quality aerial footage

From high-rise real estate drone photography in Miami to cinematic rooftop drone filming in Berlin, port inspection drones in Abu Dhabi, or farmland drone surveys in Valencia, our teams operate with local precision and global expertise.

When you choose Dazz Drones, you’re not just booking a shoot—you’re partnering with a global drone photography and videography company, designed to deliver breathtaking aerial visuals anywhere, anytime.

250+ Drone Shoots Every Day | 1,000+ Certified Drone Pilots | 43+ Countries | One Simple Drone Booking App

Dazz Drones – The world’s fastest and most trusted way to hire professional drone pilots for photography, videography, inspections, and events.

THE TECHNOLOGY BEHIND DAZZ DRONES

Advanced Engineering: Built on Flutter, ensuring a fast, seamless, and consistent user experience across iOS, Android, and Web.

Global Expertise: Developed by a team of tech experts from Europe, America, Asia, and the Middle East.

Localized Experience: Automatic language switching for a smooth, region-specific experience.

Top Security: Advanced encryption and robust data protection.

Secure Payments: Integrated with Stripe for safe and reliable transactions.

title: SkyyPilot - For drone pilots
description:
SkyyTask has created this app designed for licensed drone pilots to connect with consumers and have a streamlined platform to bid work and grow their business!  We wanted to be the first to simplify the way a pilot can setup a profile, build their bio, showcase the areas they specialize in, meet clients, bid jobs and expand their ability to efficiently and effectively keep their drones busy. We believe in empowering pilots to feel like they have control over their pricing based on their equipment, expertise and location. An array of jobs can be offered to bid, for example but not limited to - Real Estate (Commercial / Residential), 3D Mapping, Deer Recoveries, Missing Pets, Renewable Energy (Solar / Wind), Agriculture, Thermal Inspections and so much more!  This app is for businesses and the average licensed pilot looking to create opportunities with their drone. SkyyTask has also built an integrated website that performs like the mobile app for those who also work from their PC or Mac. This app offers a variety of features that makes the process user friendly, yet detailed, connecting you with job opportunities, all at your finger tips.
Note:
• Both Pilot and Client have one round of negotiating. 
• Once bid is accepted from both parties, the client is prompted to Stripe for payment. 
“Skyy’s the limit - Trust us to take your vision to new heights!”

title: GoFundMe: Fundraise and Give
description:
Welcome to the world’s most powerful community for good, where everyone can give and get help. Launch a fundraiser in minutes, start a donor-advised fund to support all your favorite nonprofits in one place, and inspire your community with your GoFundMe Profile. There’s so much you can do on GoFundMe.
 
START A FUNDRAISER
Launch a fundraiser for yourself, a friend or a nonprofit. Manage your fundraiser on the go and share your unique fundraiser link with your community to spread the word. App notifications help you never miss a donation alert or an important update about your fundraiser.

*NEW* ALL YOUR GIVING IN ONE PLACE WITH GIVING FUNDS
Giving Funds are donor-advised funds (DAF) that allow you to simplify giving and maximize impact while growing your contribution tax-free. You can donate the funds to a nonprofit of your choice at any time. During tax season, you'll get one receipt that shows all of your giving, all in one place.

GIVE FORWARD WITH GOFUNDME PROFILES
Share the causes you care about and inspire your community to help. Feature your favorite fundraisers and nonprofits, and track your impact from fundraisers you’ve started and supported.

title: X DRONE PRO
description:
X DRONE PRO is the control center tailor-made for our X-Series drones. It combines intuitive operation with powerful features to deliver a stable and smooth flight experience, helping you capture unique perspectives with ease.
【Key Features】
🎙️ Voice Control
Command your drone with your voice. Simply say "Take off," "Land," "Move left," or "Take photo" to control the flight hands-free, allowing you to focus on framing and creativity.
📸 Photo & Video
Take full control of the drone's camera. Adjust settings and capture stunning high-resolution photos and 4K videos. Save and share your masterpieces with just one tap.
👋 Gesture Recognition
Go controller-free. Use preset hand gestures to trigger actions like taking a photo or starting a recording. Perfect for group selfies and hands-free operation.
🎮 Virtual Joystick
An intuitive and responsive virtual joystick on your screen provides precise control, making piloting straightforward and accessible for everyone.

Download X DRONE PROtoday and unleash the full potential of your X-Series drone!

title: DiveMate (Scuba Dive Log)
description: DiveMate is the dive log book app to quickly and easily document your diving experiences. Connect your dive computer, transfer dives and enrich them with personal experiences via picture, video and notes. https://www.divemate.de For some dive computer models we offer DiveMate Fusion accessories for the transfer. DiveMate is also very well suited for diving instructors in training. Students' dive computers can be read directly after diving and analyzed on the tablet using the profile. DiveMate is optimized for smartphones and tablets. The logbook with manual entry of dives does not need any additional packs. Powerful additional features can be supplemented with the one-time purchase of "Extension Packs" and used on all Android devices.    Features: • Transfer from your dive computer (supports over 170 models from 22 manufacturers via USB, Infrared and Bluetooth [Transfer Pack]) • This allows fast and easy logging of dives • Complete logbook: Paper and PC no longer required • Optimized for smartphones and tablets of all sizes • Display of depth, pressure and temperature profile • Capture your diving experiences with pictures, notes and buddies with signatures • All dive data plus RMV/SAC, weight, bottle and gas parameters • Brevet and medical instructions • Multi-Edit function: updating equal fields of several dives with one change (advantage compared to dive templates) • Share your dives and dive sites • Merge dives and re-number dives comfortably • Dive site management with over 20 online maps (also via GPS) • Save many online maps for offline use when traveling [Map Pack] • Multiple divers (for at least one pack for more than 2 divers) • Print: logbook, profile, dive site map [Data Pack] • Backup & Sync between Android devices via Dropbox [Data Pack] • Sync with PC/Mac programs [Data Pack] • Statistics • Nitrox MOD calculator • Works on liveaboards or off the coast without internet connection • Continuous development and improvement based on user feedback • title: OceanEyes
description:
OceanEyes: Observing Citizen Engagement - Accessible Network of Environmental Sightings

Welcome to OceanEyes, a platform dedicated to the wonder and preservation of marine life in the Indian Ocean. Our app empowers you to be an active participant in marine species conservation and exploration.

Discover Marine Biodiversity: Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world of marine biodiversity. With OceanEyes, you can document and share your observations of the incredible marine species inhabiting the Indian Ocean. Every sighting contributes to a greater understanding of these diverse and delicate ecosystems.

Community of Marine Enthusiasts: OceanEyes brings together a community of passionate individuals who share your love for the ocean. Connect with like-minded enthusiasts, engage in discussions, and work collaboratively with others who are equally dedicated to marine conservation.

Promote Conservation: Your observations have a profound impact. By sharing your findings with the OceanEyes community, you play a vital role in marine species conservation. Together, we're raising awareness about the importance of our oceans and striving to protect and sustainably manage their diverse ecosystems.

Stay Informed: OceanEyes keeps you updated with the latest news, projects, and initiatives in the realm of marine biology and ecology. We believe that staying informed is a crucial part of marine conservation.

Join Our Mission: OceanEyes is a flagship initiative under the Deep Ocean Mission project by the Centre for Marine Living Resources & Ecology. We invite you to be part of this mission, contributing to a better understanding of marine biodiversity and promoting the conservation and sustainable management of our oceans.

Download OceanEyes now, and embark on a journey of discovery, conservation, and community engagement. Your passion for marine species observation is making a tangible difference, and we can't wait to explore the depths of the Indian Ocean with you.

*Together, let's make our oceans a better place for all its inhabitants. *

Download OceanEyes and become a marine conservationist today.

Save, browse, and share missions.
Waypoint actions.
Search locations and plan with precision.
Virtual Co-Pilot
Perfect for drones without native Point of Interest functionality (e.g., Mavic Mini).

Your Co-Pilot helps you:
Automatically rotate the drone and camera to focus on a selected POI.
Perform advanced maneuvers like Orbit, Follow/Track Me, and Cable Cam.
The Co-Pilot makes professional shots accessible, even for beginners!

Follow Me!
Enjoy a complete GPS-based follow functionality:
Track Me: Follow from any direction.
Altitude Follow: Maintain altitude automatically.*
Orbit While Follow: Combine follow and orbit.
Live updates to follow parameters.
Automatic home-point updates for safety.
(*Requires GPS and barometer-equipped devices.)

VR Functionality
Experience immersive drone flying with any VR headset!
Fully customizable VR view: adjust position, size, and eye-width.
Animated on-screen display with essential flight information.
Head Tracking:
Move the gimbal up/down on all supported drones.
Move the gimbal left/right (Mavic 2 series, Mavic Air 2, Air 2S).
Switch to your device camera for easy navigation while wearing the headset.

AR Localizer
Enhance your situational awareness with Augmented Reality locators:
Green: Home position.
Red: Selected POI location and distance.
Blue: GPS position of the piloting device.
(Note: GPS, compass, or barometer errors may affect accuracy.)

Complete Camera Control
Access and adjust all camera settings directly in the app.

FCC Mode Friendly
The app doesn’t automatically revert drones set to FCC mode back to CE mode.

Sync Flight Logs with AirData UAV
Easily sync and analyze your flight logs with AirData UAV for detailed performance insights.

Compatible DJI™ Drones
This app is optimized for:
Mavic Air, Mavic Air 2, Mavic Air 2S, Mavic Mini, Mavic Mini 2, Mavic Mini SE,
Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, Mavic 2 Enterprise, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom,
Mavic Pro Alpine, Mavic Pro Platinum, Mavic Pro, and Spark.

Unlock your drone's full potential and elevate your flying experience.
Download the app now and start flying smarter today!

title: KEIRO™
description:
A key element of any robotics system is the programming software. ENGINO® has developed a special software, KEIRO, which is a block-based programming platform that allows different methods of programming depending on the user’s needs and capabilities. 
The robot can also be programmed manually using the on-board buttons. The software is used for editing the program and adding complex functionality with the use of a user friendly Flow Diagram Interface.

title: Cell Hero
description: Cell Hero is a strategic simulation game that immerses players in a world where they must lead an army of cells to combat enemies and reclaim their homeland. Players are tasked with earning rewards through successful missions to strengthen their cellular soldiers. The game's unique twist involves crafting an exclusive hero lineup that triggers wondrous chemical reactions, enhancing gameplay. With a plethora of quirky weapons and potent skills to discover, "Cell Hero" promises a blend of management and adventure as players forge ahead in this captivating cellular saga.

title: Lynx® Drive Mobile
description:
Access Your Lynx® Central Control System—Anytime. Anywhere.

Lynx® Drive Mobile by Toro® puts the power of the Lynx® Central Control System into the palm of your hand. Designed specifically for golf course irrigation professionals, this app gives you complete control, insight, and mobility to manage your course with confidence—on or off the property.

Whether you’re inspecting greens, walking fairways, or off-site, Lynx Drive delivers secure access to real-time system data, intuitive controls, and the tools you need to keep your course performing at its best

- Interactive Course Map – Navigate your system with a full-coverage map and one-tap access to every station.
- Run Water Instantly – Execute manual irrigation by time or amount from any location.
- Track Every Action - Stay up to date with real-time alerts, flags, and notes.
- Add Smart Notes – Log course observations, repairs, and photos directly within the app.
- At-a-Glance Status – Monitor all programs performance and activity in one streamlined view.
- Station configuration and troubleshooting tools - Diagnose, sync, replace decoder address or isolate station-level problems instantly.

Built for today’s irrigation professional, Toro Lynx® Drive Mobile delivers the clarity, control, and confidence you need to stay a step ahead—on the go.

NSN Portal credentials are required to connect the mobile app with the Lynx® Drive Central Control desktop system.
The desktop system must be connected to the network.
The mobile device must have an active internet connection (cellular or Wi-Fi).

title: AES Smart
description:
AES Global Ltd proudly present the AES Smart App which will provide access to a range of our IP products. Such as the Praetorian Guard IP Video Intercom, IP Cameras and more to come.

In use with our intercom, the app will allow you to see and hear your visitors in real time, speak with them or unlock the gate or door. When visitors press the call button, you receive a push notification on your phone or tablet and can immediately answer your intercom – from anywhere in the world. It can also send instant alerts when a visitor triggers the built-in motion sensor or uses the keypad or PROX reader (if applicable on your model). No matter if you are at home or not, you will never miss a visitor or a delivery.

Our IP technology is continuously improved through regular app and hardware updates. The systems will works in your local network (LAN) as well as outside of your home network environment without range limitation. You can connect the devices to the internet via CAT5 cable or WIFI connection.

AES Smart Features:
• Live HD video (120 camera lens & night vision)

• 2-way audio communication

• Worldwide mobile access to Praetorian Guard IP Video Intercoms

• Push notifications on your smartphone or tablet when the call button is

pushed, motion sensor is triggered or keypad/prox code is used.

• Program 24-7 / Timed and Temporary Keypad codes or PROX ID's

• Past 100 event history

• Up to 8 separate users with different permission levels

• SD card storage for all video & picture files. (Can accommodate up to 32GB)

• Voicemail - Visitors can leave a video messages when unanswered

• Do-Not-Disturb (DND) - Disable the call button to avoid getting calls.

Note that you are required to create an account, and have an AES product to connect to the app.
